Giriboy

Korean: 기리보이

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Hong Si-young
Native name:

Birthday:
Jan 24, 1991

34 years old
Blood type:
Height:
5'10" (178 cm)
Weight:
132.3 lbs (60 kg)

Introduction

Giriboy is a South Korean rapper, songwriter, and record producer signed to Just Music Entertainment. Giriboy debuted on November 18, 2011 with the song “You Look So Good to Me” featuring Swings.

Standard Friends:
Feb 25, 2024-present

Fun facts

1
He is known to have a large female following.
…
2
Giriboy translates to “to see the way” in Korean, to him, it means that no matter what he does, things in front of him are bright and promising.
…
3
He is a member of the Do’main Crew with Andup, Zico, Ugly Duck, Hanhae, Gganmo, Geeks & TakeOne .
…
4
He was a mentor on the hip hop survival show “No Mercy”.
…
5
He likes to play basketball.
…
6
He was a contestant on season three of the TV show “Show Me the Money” in 2014.
…
